{"session_id":"611f8fda-e441-4e87-9fe3-59f51c29e910","text":"

üîÑ **Switching to ComfyUI-Copilot**

### Workflow Recommendations for Creating Short Video Clips from LTX

Here are some workflow options to help you create short video clips based on "ltx":

#### 1. Recalled Workflows

Based on your request, I found these existing workflows that might be helpful:

*   **api-t2i2v-txt\_to\_image\_to\_video**
    *   **Description:** Creates a short animated video clip from a text description of a nature scene.
    *   **Use Case:** Ideal if your "ltx" content can be translated into a text description of a scene you want to animate.
    *   **Image:** ![api-t2i2v-txt\_to\_image\_to\_video](https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2F648f8d5e2e924162852e98f2a249e3b0.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066264036&Signature=ZcP5qLm%2B4W23KXaNhJlQnPJljDw%3D)

*   **sdxl-t2i2v-api**
    *   **Description:** Creates a short animated video clip based on your text description.
    *   **Use Case:** Similar to the above, this workflow is good for generating smooth, high-quality animations from text prompts.
    *   **Image:** ![sdxl-t2i2v-api](https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2Fbb9685f63da3498f8e743172a8083f9d.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066264381&Signature=BiWhDeYVswBNpH23UtP9WqDNUEk%3D)

*   **api-t2v\_ltxv\_text\_to\_video**
    *   **Description:** Creates a short animated video clip (about 4 seconds) from text, with a focus on natural and fluid movement. This workflow specifically mentions "ltxv".
    *   **Use Case:** This workflow seems highly relevant as it explicitly includes "ltxv" in its description, suggesting it might be directly applicable to your "ltx" content.
    *   **Image:** ![api-t2v\_ltxv\_text\_to\_video](https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2F2f5343c2b19c4afba48b8f9079ed736d.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066264124&Signature=w1X1XSG3Pxay02KBI3twT%2B3xEpQ%3D)

#### 2. AI Generated Workflow

I have also generated a new personalized workflow solution for you:

*   **AI Generated Workflow**
    *   **Description:** Build a workflow that creates a short video clip based on 'ltx' content.
    *   **Use Case:** This is a custom-generated workflow tailored to your specific request.
    *   **Image:** ![AI Generated Workflow](https://ppc-img.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/AI_workflow_default.jpg)

Please let me know if you have any questions about these workflows or would like further adjustments!","finished":true,"type":"message","format":"markdown","ext":[{"type":"workflow","data":[{"id":31809,"name":"AI Generated Workflow","description":"Build a workflow that creates a short video clip based on 'ltx' content.","image":"https://ppc-img.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/AI_workflow_default.jpg","unique_id":"4d7e074f326a544bfcba0daf615ae220","score":null,"source":"AI Generated"},{"id":26740,"name":"api-t2i2v-txt_to_image_to_video","description":"Create a short animated video clip from a text description of a nature scene. I want to describe a beautiful landscape and have it turned into a flowing video with natural movement, like clouds drifting or water flowing, without needing to provide any reference video or images.","image":"https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2F648f8d5e2e924162852e98f2a249e3b0.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066264036&Signature=ZcP5qLm%2B4W23KXaNhJlQnPJljDw%3D","unique_id":"554fd2c996083c5b9525051d49a6b2f5","score":[0.5690833843847055,0.5]},{"id":26745,"name":"sdxl-t2i2v-api","description":"Create a short animated video clip based on my text description. The video should be a few seconds long and loop seamlessly.","image":"https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2Fbb9685f63da3498f8e743172a8083f9d.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066264381&Signature=BiWhDeYVswBNpH23UtP9WqDNUEk%3D","unique_id":"ef568bd54974e83122c8ac59ba02c8c2","score":[0.616972625255589,0.5]},{"id":26831,"name":"api-t2v_ltxv_text_to_video","description":"Create a short animated video clip (about 4 seconds) showing two women having a conversation, where one has brown hair wearing a black jacket and the other has blonde hair. {"session_id":"fd931296-4337-4f1a-bd23-27b3a17caf07","text":"

üîÑ **Switching to ComfyUI-Copilot**

### Image to Anime Style Workflows

Here are some workflow options to transform your images into an anime style:

#### Recalled Workflows

1.  **api-i2i_image2image**
    *   **Description:** This workflow is designed to modify portrait photos to add anime-style features like furry ears while preserving most of the original facial features. It aims for a clean final image without watermarks or text overlays.
    *   **Image:** ![api-i2i_image2image](https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2Ff3a37b904b6d4ad4ae7db5039c8fffe9.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066263152&Signature=DsEDthKG%2BEHXHWO3S0dSD7rRURY%3D)

2.  **api-i2i_flux_canny_model_example**
    *   **Description:** This workflow focuses on transforming portrait photos into anime-style characters while maintaining the basic pose and composition of the original photo. It can incorporate specific anime features such as fennec ears, a fluffy tail, blonde hair, and blue eyes, with characters wearing casual clothes. The goal is a high-quality anime illustration.
    *   **Image:** ![api-i2i_flux_canny_model_example](https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2Fa36288a992704596b74556539fefbd25.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066263038&Signature=oTHt155s64%2FHAzETosaTYesTUc%3D)

3.  **api-i2v_image_to_video_wan**
    *   **Description:** While primarily for animation, this workflow involves an initial image of an anime character and can be used to create movement from a still anime image. This might be relevant if you later want to animate the anime-styled output.
    *   **Image:** ![api-i2v_image_to_video_wan](https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2Fbb12a2decb0c4f55a66caefa98eaf1d8.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066263536&Signature=c9MxE0hqAMEb4%2FNGG7UnwRylz6Y%3D)

#### AI Generated Workflow

*   **Name:** AI Generated Workflow
*   **Description:** This custom workflow is designed to transform an input image into an anime art style, effectively preserving key features from the original image while applying characteristic anime aesthetics.
*   **Image:** ![AI Generated Workflow](https://ppc-img.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/AI_workflow_default.jpg)

You can choose one of the recommended workflows above, or explore the AI-generated solution. If you have any further questions about these workflows, feel free to ask!","finished":true,"type":"message","format":"markdown","ext":[{"type":"workflow","data":[{"id":31813,"name":"AI Generated Workflow","description":"Build a workflow that transforms an input image into an anime art style, preserving key features while applying anime aesthetics.","image":"https://ppc-img.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/AI_workflow_default.jpg","unique_id":"578e2c1ebc888b09319bfc7310dd3b02","score":null,"source":"AI Generated"},{"id":26711,"name":"api-i2i_image2image","description":"I want to modify my portrait photo to add anime-style features like furry ears while keeping most of my original facial features intact. The final image should look clean without any watermarks or text overlays.","image":"https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2Ff3a37b904b6d4ad4ae7db5039c8fffe9.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066263152&Signature=DsEDthKG%2BEHXHWO3S0dSD7rRURY%3D","unique_id":"7326dc2eb7014aea9bb8853293f1261b","score":[0.5843760618939373,0.5]},{"id":26819,"name":"api-i2i_flux_canny_model_example","description":"I want to transform my portrait photos into anime-style characters while keeping the basic pose and composition of the original photo. The anime character should have specific features like fennec ears and a fluffy tail, with blonde hair and blue eyes, wearing casual clothes. The final result should look like a high-quality anime illustration.","image":"https://aib-vision-hz.oss-accelerate.aliyuncs.com/mood_board%2Finput%2F2025-06-26%2Fa36288a992704596b74556539fefbd25.png?x-oss-process=style%2Fresize&OSSAccessKeyId=LTAI5tQyhnsJhtiinV3B1gfV&Expires=2066263038&Signature=oTHt155s64%2FLHAzETosaTYesTUc%3D","unique_id":"8e456b0c483b5eb64b4aac78bd5cd4be","score":[0.6201659297745311,0.5]},{"id":26822,"name":"api-i2v_image_to_video_wan","description":"I have a still image of an anime character and I want to create a short animation where the character smoothly turns around. {"session_id":"bb570efe-14c4-4bde-b595-593026375d5f","text":"

üîÑ **Switching to ComfyUI-Copilot**

### Image Editing Workflows

Here are some workflow options for image editing, including both recalled and newly generated solutions:

#### **Recalled Workflows**

Based on your request, I've found a few relevant workflows that handle various image editing tasks:

1.  **image-edit-api (1)**
    *   **Description:** This workflow allows you to modify photos using text descriptions. For example, you can change hair color or add specific features while preserving the natural look and original composition of the image. It takes your photo and a text description of the desired changes as input.

2.  **image-edit-api**
    *   **Description:** This workflow is designed for modifying photos of people. You can add specific objects or change expressions while maintaining the person's identity and overall appearance. For instance, you could make someone smile more or add a coffee cup they're holding, with the changes blending in seamlessly.

3.  **i2i-editing**
    *   **Description:** If you have a landscape image and want to extend its canvas size in any direction, this workflow can help. It maintains the original artistic style and atmosphere, ensuring the new areas blend seamlessly with the existing image.

#### **AI Generated Workflow**

I've also generated a new, personalized workflow solution for general image editing:

1.  **AI Generated Workflow**
    *   **Description:** This workflow is designed to perform general image editing operations, including resizing, cropping, and color correction. It provides a versatile solution for common image manipulation needs.

You can choose one of the recommended workflows above, or let AI generate a personalized solution based on your input. If you have any specific questions about any of these workflows, feel free to ask!","finished":true,"type":"message","format":"markdown","ext":[{"type":"workflow","data":[{"id":31815,"name":"AI Generated Workflow","description":"Build a workflow that allows for general image editing, including operations like resizing, cropping, and color correction.","image":"https://ppc-img.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/AI_workflow_default.jpg","unique_id":"6f7faac37e32285a935b8699ecc70c15","score":null,"source":"AI Generated"},{"id":26728,"name":"image-edit-api (1)","description":"I want to modify my photos by describing the changes I want in plain text. For example, I want to be able to change hair color or add specific features while keeping the rest of the image looking natural and maintaining the original composition. The workflow should take my photo and a text description of the desired changes as input, and produce a modified version of my photo that incorporates these changes.","image":"","unique_id":"7c9029b78952b52475f5a77d3b5dd781","score":[0.6382076740264893,0]},{"id":26733,"name":"image-edit-api","description":"I have a photo of a person, and I'd like to modify it to add specific objects or change their expression while keeping their identity and overall appearance intact. For example, I want to make them smile more and add objects they're holding, like a coffee cup. The changes should look natural and seamless.","image":"","unique_id":"4080a7a9b33783892cf3cf4fed1755de","score":[0.5695966821668564,0]},{"id":26776,"name":"i2i-editing","description":"I have a beautiful landscape image and I want to extend its canvas size in all directions while maintaining the same artistic style and atmosphere. The new areas should blend seamlessly with the original image and follow the same artistic pattern. Can you create a workflow that achieves this?","image":"","unique_id":"2e7970867f24319161de9a09504350d3","score":[0.5364670477191844,0.25]}]}],"message_id":"225cc1d8-10d9-44ae-bccd-007d4f3e88b2"}

{"session_id":"62d2eed7-a9c2-4b34-b596-4a73b9ce6dad","text":"
‚ñ∏ **Switching to Workflow Rewrite Agent**

I'll help you rewrite the current workflow to add cat detection and cutout functionality. Let me first get the current workflow and then add the appropriate nodes for intelligent background removal.Now let me get the intelligent background removal experience to add cat detection and cutout functionality:Perfect! I'll rewrite your workflow to add intelligent cat detection and cutout functionality. I'll use the SAM (Segment Anything Model) with GroundingDINO for precise cat detection and segmentation.Perfect! I've successfully rewritten your workflow to add intelligent cat detection and cutout functionality. Here's what I've added:

## New Features Added:

### **Cat Detection & Segmentation System:**
1. **SAM Model Loader (Node 29)** - Loads the Segment Anything Model for precise segmentation
2. **GroundingDINO Model Loader (Node 30)** - Loads the object detection model for finding cats
3. **Cat Detection & Segmentation (Node 31)** - The main node that:
   - Detects cats in your generated image using the prompt "cat"
   - Uses a threshold of 0.3 for detection sensitivity
   - Automatically segments and cuts out the detected cat with precise boundaries

### **Enhanced Output Options:**
1. **Save Original Image (Node 20)** - Saves your original generated image with prefix "ComfyUI_original"
2. **Save Cat Cutout (Node 32)** - Saves the extracted cat as a separate image with prefix "ComfyUI_cat_cutout"
3. **Preview Cat Cutout (Node 33)** - Shows a preview of the extracted cat in the interface

## How It Works:
1. Your original workflow generates the cat image as before
2. The generated image is fed into the GroundingDINO + SAM pipeline
3. GroundingDINO detects the cat using natural language ("cat" prompt)
4. SAM performs precise segmentation to cut out the cat with clean edges
5. You get both the original image and the extracted cat as separate outputs

## Model Requirements:
- **SAM Model**: "sam_vit_h (2.56GB)" - High-quality segmentation model
- **GroundingDINO**: "GroundingDINO_SwinT_OGC (694MB)" - Object detection model

The workflow will now automatically detect and cut out any cats in your generated images with high precision, giving you clean cutouts suitable for further use or editing!","finished":true,"type":"message","format":"markdown","ext":[{"type":"workflow_update","data":{"workflow_data":{"2":{"inputs":{"noise":["5",0],"guider":["7",0],"sampler":["4",0],"sigmas":["3",0],"latent_image":["10",0]},"class_type":"SamplerCustomAdvanced","_meta":{"title":"SamplerCustomAdvanced"}},"3":{"inputs":{"scheduler":"simple","steps":20,"denoise":1,"model":["8",0]},"class_type":"BasicScheduler","_meta":{"title":"BasicScheduler"}},"4":{"inputs":{"sampler_name":"euler"},"class_type":"KSamplerSelect","_meta":{"title":"KSamplerSelect"}},"5":{"inputs":{"noise_seed":571457442342604},"class_type":"RandomNoise","_meta":{"title":"RandomNoise"}},"6":{"inputs":{"clip_name1":"t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors","clip_name2":"clip_l.safetensors","type":"flux","device":"default"},"class_type":"DualCLIPLoader","_meta":{"title":"DualCLIPLoader"}},"7":{"inputs":{"model":["8",0],"conditioning":["11",0]},"class_type":"BasicGuider","_meta":{"title":"BasicGuider"}},"8":{"inputs":{"unet_name":"flux1-krea-dev.safetensors","weight_dtype":"fp8_e4m3fn"},"class_type":"UNETLoader","_meta":{"title":"Load Diffusion Model"}},"9":{"inputs":{"vae_name":"ae.safetensors"},"class_type":"VAELoader","_meta":{"title":"Load VAE"}},"10":{"inputs":{"width":["27",0],"height":["28",0],"batch_size":1},"class_type":"EmptyLatentImage","_meta":{"title":"Empty Latent Image"}},"11":{"inputs":{"text":["25",0],"clip":["6",0]},"class_type":"CLIPTextEncode","_meta":{"title":"CLIP Text Encode messages.content:
{"text":"‚ñ∏ **Switching to ComfyUI-Debug-Coordinator**

I'll validate and debug your ComfyUI workflow. Let me start by checking the current state of the workflow to identify any errors.

‚öô *ComfyUI-Debug-Coordinator is using run_workflow...*



‚óè *Tool execution completed*

```
{"success": false, "error": {"type": "prompt_outputs_failed_validation", "message": "Prompt outputs failed validation", "details": "", "extra_info": {}}, "node_errors": {"21": {"errors": [{"type": "re...
```

I found an error in the workflow! There's a connection issue where node 21 (VAEDecode) is missing its required "samples" input. Let me analyze this error type to determine the best approach for fixing it.

‚öô *ComfyUI-Debug-Coordinator is using analyze_error_type...*



‚óè *Tool execution completed*

```
{"error_type": "connection_error", "recommended_agent": "link_agent", "error_details": [{"error_type": "connection_error", "message": "Detected 4 connection-related issues", "details": "Connection or ...
```

This is a connection error where the VAEDecode node is missing its required "samples" input connection. I'll hand this off to the Link Agent to fix the missing connection.

‚ñ∏ **Switching to Link Agent**

Perfect! Now I'm the Link Agent and will analyze and fix the connection issues in your workflow. Let me start by performing a comprehensive connection analysis.

‚öô *Link Agent is using analyze_missing_connections...*



‚óè *Tool execution completed*

```
{"missing_connections": [{"node_id": "7", "node_class": "KSampler", "input_name": "latent_image", "input_config": ["LATENT", {"tooltip": "The latent image to denoise."}], "required": true, "expected_t...
```

**Connection analysis:** Found 5 missing required connections across multiple nodes:
- Node 7 (KSampler): missing latent_image input 
- Node 21 (VAEDecode): missing samples input
- Node 28 (ReduxAdvanced): missing conditioning, style_model, and image inputs

All missing connections can be resolved using existing nodes with high confidence matches available.

**Chosen strategy:** Connect existing nodes - all required inputs have perfect type-compatible outputs available from existing nodes. This is a pure connection fix scenario with no new nodes needed.

Let me apply the connection fixes using the optimal connection strategy:

‚öô *Link Agent is using apply_connection_fixes...*



‚óè *Tool execution completed*

```
{"success": true, "version_id": 2171, "applied_fixes": [{"type": "connection", "target": "7.latent_image", "source": "75[0]", "old_value": "not connected", "new_value": ["75", 0]}, {"type": "connectio...
```

**Fixes applied:** Successfully connected all 5 missing required inputs:
- ‚úÖ Connected EmptyLatentImage ‚Üí KSampler (latent_image)
- ‚úÖ Connected KSampler ‚Üí VAEDecode (samples) 
- ‚úÖ Connected CLIPTextEncode ‚Üí ReduxAdvanced (conditioning)
- ‚úÖ Connected StyleModelLoader ‚Üí ReduxAdvanced (style_model)
- ‚úÖ Connected LoadImage ‚Üí ReduxAdvanced (image)

All connections were established with high confidence type matches. The workflow now has a complete data flow from input nodes through processing to final output.

‚ñ∏ **Switching to ComfyUI-Debug-Coordinator**

Excellent! The Link Agent has successfully fixed all the missing connections. Now let me validate the workflow again to confirm all issues have been resolved.

‚öô *ComfyUI-Debug-Coordinator is using run_workflow...*



‚óè *Tool execution completed*

```
{"success": false, "error": {"type": "prompt_outputs_failed_validation", "message": "Prompt outputs failed validation", "details": "", "extra_info": {}}, "node_errors": {"3": {"errors": [{"type": "val...
```

Great progress! The connection issues have been resolved, but now there's a parameter error. Node 3 (LoraLoader) has an invalid LoRA name that's not in the available list. Let me analyze this error type.

‚öô *ComfyUI-Debug-Coordinator is using analyze_error_type...*



‚óè *Tool execution completed*

```
{"error_type": "mixed_connection_error", "recommended_agent": "link_agent", "error_details": [{"error_type": "connection_error", "message": "Detected 3 connection-related issues", "details": "Connecti...
```

This is actually a parameter error (value_not_in_list), not a connection error. The analysis might be mixed up. Let me hand this off to the Parameter Agent to fix the invalid LoRA name.

‚ñ∏ **Switching to Parameter Agent**

Issue identified: enum_value_mismatch - LoRA file 'flux/Flux_Ghibli_v2_25.safetensors' not found in available LoRA list.

Let me analyze this parameter error to find a suitable replacement:

‚öô *Parameter Agent is using find_matching_parameter_value...*

{"session_id":"bbe71936-8402-4fd0-8bb4-69eecac5ee01","text":"‰ª•‰∏ãÊòØÂèØ‰ª•ÂêàÂπ∂Â§öÂº†ÂõæÁâáÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÔºö

1. **MonoMerge**  
   [GitHubÈìæÊé•](https://github.com/bmad4ever/comfyui_bmad_nodes): Â∞Ü‰∏§Âº†ÂõæÁâáÂêàÂπ∂‰∏∫ÂçïËâ≤ÂõæÁâáÔºåÂèØÈÄâÊã©Âú®ÁôΩËâ≤ÊàñÈªëËâ≤ÊñπÂêëÂêàÂπ∂„ÄÇ

   [GitHubÈìæÊé•](https://github.com/melMass/comfy_mtb): ÂèØÂ∞ÜÂ§öÂº†ÂõæÁâáÂêàÂπ∂Êàê‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊâπÊ¨°ÔºåÈÄÇÁî®‰∫éÂ§ÑÁêÜÂíåÊìçÊéßÂõæÁâáÈõÜ„ÄÇ

4. **MergeLayers**  
   [GitHubÈìæÊé•](https://github.com/shadowcz007/comfyui-mixlab-nodes): Â∞ÜÂ§öÂ±ÇÂõæÂÉèÂêàÂπ∂‰∏∫ÂçïÂº†ÂõæÁâáÔºåÊîØÊåÅÊåáÂÆöÁöÑÈÅÆÁΩ©ÂíåÊ∑∑ÂêàÈÄâÈ°π„ÄÇ

5. **Composite Images üßÖ**  
   [GitHubÈìæÊé•](https://github.com/natto-maki/ComfyUI-NegiTools): ÁªìÂêà‰∏§Âº†ÂõæÁâáÔºåÊîØÊåÅÂ§öÁßçÂ§çÂêàÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂ¶Ç‰πòÊ≥ï„ÄÅÂàíÂàÜ„ÄÅÂè†Âä†Á≠â„ÄÇ

6. **ImageContainerInheritanceSum**  
   [GitHubÈìæÊé•](https://github.com/Nourepide/ComfyUI-Allor): ÈÄöËøáÊÄªÁªìÂõæÂÉèÁª¥Â∫¶‰ª•ÂàõÂª∫Â§çÂêàÂõæÂÉèÔºåÈÄÇÁî®‰∫éÈúÄË¶ÅËÄÉËôëËæìÂÖ•ÂõæÂÉèÊÄªÂÆΩÂíåÈ´òÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ„ÄÇ

7. **Join Image Lists**  
   [GitHubÈìæÊé•](https://github.com/M1kep/Comfy_KepListStuff): ÂêàÂπ∂Â§öÂº†ÂõæÁâáÂàóË°®Êàê‰∏∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàóË°®ÔºåÂêåÊó∂Êèê‰æõÂéüÂàóË°®Â§ßÂ∞è„ÄÇ

8. **Merge Image List**  
   [GitHubÈìæÊé•](https://github.com/AInseven/ComfyUI-fastblend): ÂêàÂπ∂ÂõæÂÉèÂº†ÈáèÂàóË°®‰∏∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Âçï‰∏ÄÂº†ÈáèÔºå‰æø‰∫éÂõæÂÉèÁõ∏ÂÖ≥‰ªªÂä°ÁöÑÊâπÂ§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÇ

Ê†πÊçÆ‰Ω†ÁöÑÂÖ∑‰ΩìÈúÄÊ±ÇÈÄâÊã©ÂêàÈÄÇÁöÑËäÇÁÇπ‰ΩøÁî®„ÄÇ","finished":true,"format":"markdown","ext":[{"type":"node","data":[{"id":28311,"unique_id":"7cca1314298b9a9d4b785e009099ea28","name":"MonoMerge","name_oral":"MonoMerge","description":"The MonoMerge node is designed to merge two images into a monochromatic image based on a target color scheme (either towards white or black). This process involves comparing the luminance (L component) of corresponding pixels from both images and selecting the higher or lower value depending on the target, resulting in an image that emphasizes either the lighter or darker aspects of the combined images.","github_url":"https://github.com/bmad4ever/comfyui_bmad_nodes","github_stars":50,"from_index":0,"to_index":0,"is_existed":true},{"id":29658,"unique_id":"e3a2782874d3bf8f99bb2b70c7090f74","name":"Concat Images (mtb)","name_oral":"Concat Images (mtb)","description":"The Concat Images node is designed to merge multiple images into a single batch, allowing for efficient processing and manipulation of image collections. It provides flexibility in handling size mismatches through customizable strategies.","github_url":"https://github.com/melMass/comfy_mtb","github_stars":350,"from_index":0,"to_index":0,"is_existed":true},{"id":29719,"unique_id":"458e445b2f21e81111dc9a7d3fb8cb7b","name":"easy joinImageBatch","name_oral":"JoinImageBatch","description":"This node is designed to merge a batch of images into a single large image, either by stacking them horizontally or vertically based on the specified mode. It abstracts the complexity of image manipulation and resizing, providing a straightforward way to create composite images from multiple inputs.","github_url":"https://github.com/yolain/ComfyUI-Easy-Use","github_stars":510,"from_index":0,"to_index":0,"is_existed":true},{"id":32325,"unique_id":"0ea3707eaaf8052e37630f95f4e5b72b","name":"MergeLayers","name_oral":"Merge Layers ‚ôæÔ∏èMixlab","description":"The MergeLayers node is designed to combine multiple image layers into a single image while applying specified masks and blending options. It facilitates the creation of complex images by layering and compositing various elements based on their defined properties.","github_url":"https://github.com/shadowcz007/comfyui-mixlab-nodes","github_stars":null,"from_index":0,"to_index":0,"is_existed":true},{"id":32571,"unique_id":"0bd39afd25f012f877c9676b3c9837a1","name":"NegiTools_CompositeImages","name_oral":"Composite Images üßÖ","description":"NegiTools_CompositeImages is a versatile node designed to combine two images using various compositing methods. This node allows you to blend images in multiple ways, such as multiplying, dividing, overlaying, and more, to achieve different visual effects.","github_url":"https://github.com/natto-maki/ComfyUI-NegiTools","github_stars":30,"from_index":0,"to_index":0,"is_existed":true},{"id":32865,"unique_id":"4e6b0fa27366545e19695c4e8931e270","name":"ImageContainerInheritanceSum","name_oral":"ImageContainerInheritanceSum","description":"Efficiently combine and sum image dimensions for creating composite images with integrity and visual quality. This node is designed to facilitate the combination of multiple images by summing their dimensions. This node is particularly useful when you need to create a composite image that encompasses the total width and height of the input images.","github_url":"https://github.com/Nourepide/ComfyUI-Allor","github_stars":200,"from_index":0,"to_index":0,"is_existed":true},{"id":72827,"unique_id":"1c76ce5bcc2c5097bdf515bddd32fb0b","name":"Join Image Lists","name_oral":"Join Image Lists","description":"This node is designed to combine multiple lists of images into a single list while also providing the sizes of the original lists. It facilitates the management of image data by allowing users to easily merge and track the number of images from various sources.","github_url":"https://github.com/M1kep/Comfy_KepListStuff","github_stars":null,"from_index":0,"to_index":0,"is_existed":true},{"id":81206,"unique_id":"1cc97ed3bc709de3f23c378eef1ce74e","name":"Merge_Image_List","name_oral":"Merge Image List","description":"This node is designed to merge a list of image tensors into a single tensor, facilitating batch processing in image-related tasks. It efficiently concatenates the input images along a specified dimension, enabling seamless integration of multiple images for further processing.","github_url":"https://github.com/AInseven/ComfyUI-fastblend","github_stars":null,"from_index":0,"to_index":0,"is_existed":true}]}],"message_id":"f60c3cf2-0b54-47a3-97e3-f536fc992c81"}
